name: Space Trap (Arcanacra)
description:
You're a pilot of small, but agile and well-equipped fighter, trapped inside barrier that flies around space at random, with alien forces warping into area to finish you off.  Your aim is to survive for as long as possible, while following the arena scrolling, avoiding barrier and enemy fire, and destroying as many enemies as you can.

This is a small kinda-twin stick shooter arena game, with simple gameplay, and ever so increasing difficulty level, with simple controls:

WSAD - Move

Left mouse button - Fire

Right mouse button - Support boosters.

You'll find yourself inside a barrier arena that constantly moves on it's own, that will become faster as the time progresses, making it harder to keep up with it's pace, especially under fire. Your ship is equipped with support boosters, that will make your ship travel along with arena, letting you focus on shooting the aliens and avoiding incoming fire. Keep in mind tho, that boosters have limited fuel, that replenishes by shooting down aliens. You can see boosters' status via bar that appears above the crosshair.

This is an old game that I made in 2015 for Clickteam's 20-event competition, that had all contestants make small, simple games that consist of maximum 20 events per frame in any software made by Clickteam. I have used Multimedia Fusion 2 to make this game. It won second place in the contest. Kinda forgot about it, and now I decided to just post it here. Maybe you'll have some fun with it. Cheers!
